name: Moon Cheese Chase!
description:
=== Description ==
A harder-than-it-looks 2D physics game.

As everybody knows, the Moon is made of cheese, and the Black Hole mice colony is not going to keep waiting for it to fall down!

Fly your state-of-the-rat ship to the Moon and get it all! Make sure you collect the cheese boosters to increase your ship autonomy and don't forget to stop on the checkpoints the Colony has stablished for you. Our micechanics will install the boosters you collect and save your progress.

=== Controls ===
A and D (Left and Right Arrows): Steer Ship
W (Up key): Get a wider view
Spacebar: Reset to previous checkpoint
Escape: Show the in-game Menu

=== Credits ===
This game was developed for the Nexus Game Jam 2, from the 25th to the 27th of November 2022.

--- Programming and Level Creation ---

- Pablo Manzano
